verses.verse: The burden<WH4853> of Moab.<WH4124> Because<WH3588> in the night<WH3915> Ar<WH6144> of Moab<WH4124> is laid<WH7901> waste,<WH7703> and brought<WH1820> to silence;<WH1820> because<WH3588> in the night<WH3915> Kir<WH7024> of Moab<WH4124> is laid waste,<WH7703> and brought<WH1820> to silence;<WH1820>

He is gone<WH5927> up to Bajith,<WH1006> and to Dibon,<WH1769> the high<WH1116> places, to weep:<WH1065> Moab<WH4124> shall howl<WH3213> over<WH5921> Nebo,<WH5015> and over<WH5921> Medeba:<WH4311> on all<WH3605> their heads<WH7218> shall be baldness,<WH7144> and every<WH3605> beard<WH2206> cut<WH1438> off.

In their streets<WH2351> they shall gird<WH2296> themselves with sackcloth:<WH8242> on<WH5921> the tops<WH1406> of their houses, and in their streets,<WH7339> every<WH3605> one shall howl,<WH3213> weeping<WH1065> abundantly.<WH3381>

And Heshbon<WH2809> shall cry,<WH2199> and Elealeh:<WH500> their voice<WH6963> shall be heard<WH8085> even to Jahaz:<WH3096> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> the armed<WH2502> soldiers<WH2502> of Moab<WH4124> shall cry<WH7321> out; his life<WH5315> shall be grievous<WH3415> to him.

My heart<WH3820> shall cry<WH2199> out for Moab;<WH4124> his fugitives<WH1280> shall flee to Zoar,<WH6820> an heifer<WH5697> of three<WH7992> years old:<WH7992> for by the mounting<WH4608> up of Luhith<WH3872> with weeping<WH1065> shall they go<WH5927> it up; for in the way<WH1870> of Horonaim<WH2773> they shall raise<WH5782> up a cry<WH2201> of destruction.<WH7667>
For the waters<WH4325> of Nimrim<WH5249> shall be desolate:<WH4923> for the hay<WH2682> is withered<WH3001> away, the grass<WH1877> fails,<WH3615> there is no<WH3808> green<WH3418> thing.
Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> the abundance<WH3502> they have gotten,<WH6213> and that which they have laid<WH6486> up, shall they carry<WH5375> away to the brook<WH5158> of the willows.<WH6155>
For the cry<WH2201> is gone<WH5362> round<WH5362> about the borders<WH1366> of Moab;<WH4124> the howling<WH3213> thereof to Eglaim,<WH97> and the howling<WH3213> thereof to Beerelim.<WH879>

For the waters<WH4325> of Dimon<WH1775> shall be full<WH4390> of blood:<WH1818> for I will bring<WH7896> more<WH3254> on Dimon,<WH1775> lions<WH738> on him that escapes<WH6413> of Moab,<WH4124> and on the remnant<WH7611> of the land.<WH127>
